snippet: Alumni of ThinkFilm have become a force in an industry that has been learning to think smaller, make do with less and live more by wit than a fat bankroll.
abstract: Alumni of small, short-lived movie distributor ThinkFilm have become a force in an industry that has been learning to think smaller, make do with less and live more by wit than a fat bankroll; nearly a dozen companies, many of which will be wheeling and dealing at annual Sundance Film Festival, are rooted in diaspora created by ThinkFilm's demise in 2008.
lead_paragraph: Alumni of ThinkFilm have become a force in an industry that has been learning to think smaller, make do with less and live more by wit than a fat bankroll.

headline.main: ThinkFilm, a Short-Lived but Wily Distributor, Still Influences Industry
headline.print_headline: ThinkFilm, a Short-Lived but Wily Distributor, Still Influences Industry
